name: Bladblazers
description:
This little game was created during the 7dfps game-jam somewhere in November 2014. It's a quirky 2D shooter without guns, instead you'll be able to harness the full power of a leafblower! Give it a go!


Please note: this game was created in 7 days. Except for some bug-fixing and minor polishing it was not developed any further. It did receive some great community feedback, that's why it's still around for anyone to play! :D


Awesome Soundfx + voice-acting by Will Dawson.
www.dawsonaudioservices.com

This is a Frycandle Games creation.
www.frycandle.com
